text: Post the last photo you took on your social media.
Let the group add something random to your online shopping cart.
Talk in only questions until your next turn.
Try to juggle 3 random objects from the room.
Wear your shoes on the wrong feet until your next turn.
Eat a spoonful of a condiment chosen by the group.
Do 10 squats while shouting your own name.
Let someone write a text to a contact of their choice from your phone.
Do your best runway walk across the room.
Sing the chorus of a song chosen by the group.
Act like a cat until your next turn.
Take a silly selfie and send it to your mom/dad.
Do your worst dance move until the group says stop.
Speak only in a whisper until your next turn.
Balance a random object on your head for 1 minute.
Let the person across from you redo your hairstyle.
Swap seats with someone every time someone says 'drink' until your next turn.
Pretend you’re a waiter and take everyone’s fake food orders.
Show the group your most embarrassing saved photo.
Wear your jacket backwards for the rest of the game.
Say 'I love you' to the first contact in your phone.
Do 15 jumping jacks while shouting 'I’m the best!'
Let someone choose a new nickname for you that everyone must use.
Do an impression of your favorite celebrity until your next turn.
Show the group the last meme you saved.
Try to lick your elbow (for real).
Let the group decide your next Instagram caption.
Talk in slow motion until your next turn.
Do a silly TikTok dance, even without music.
Sing everything you want to say until your next turn.
Let someone else send one text to anyone in your phone.
Do push-ups while someone sits on your back (if safe).
Show the group your hidden photo album (if you have one).
Wear sunglasses indoors until your next turn.
Pretend you are an animal chosen by the group until your next turn.
Let the group pick a new ringtone for your phone.
Try to balance on one leg for 1 minute.
Let someone redraw your eyebrows with a pen.
Take a selfie making your ugliest face possible and send it to your best friend.
